text: @DrDenaGrayson @DrEricDing While for many Americans this might be a just a pride problem, for Europeans here this is a major concern. We can't travel to see our loved ones, we won't be welcomed back. This is a nightmare. We feel like prisoners and we also did our best here with COVID19
